name: react-timer-app
description: Simple timer app built on top of React and Redux.
author: Tanveer Karim <contact@tkarimdesign.com>

scripts.release:patch: npm run build:base && npm version patch -m 'Release v%s'
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:base && npm version minor -m 'Release v%s'
scripts.release:major: npm run build:base && npm version major -m 'Release v%s'
